definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部絞痛，嘔吐和腹瀉，通常是血便。

sentences.english: I prefer to use debit card when shop on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 我通常喜歡用提款卡在網上購物。

sentences.english: The beach life-guards usually flag one another for communication.
sentences.chinese: 海濱救生員通常用旗號傳達信息。

sentences.english: This usually results in the dreaded #2038 error.
sentences.chinese: 通常這會導致可怕的#2038錯誤。

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 帶有此特徵的犯罪行爲通常將視爲同等犯罪。

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，風水還與佔數學的原理結合起來使用。

sentences.english: Spread foundations generally can be classified as wall and column footings.
sentences.chinese: 擴展基礎通常可分爲牆基和柱基。

sentences.english: Cats and snakes are traditionally cooked together (in the south only), given the name "dragon tiger fight".
sentences.chinese: 貓和蛇通常一起做，名字叫“龍虎鬥”。

sentences.english: Any plant of the genus hoya having fleshy leaves and usually nectariferous flowers.
sentences.chinese: 球蘭屬的任一種植物，肉質葉，花朵通常分泌蜜汁。

sentences.english: Usually, galaxies this topsy-turvy result from a recent collision with a neighboring galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 通常星系這種亂七八糟是最近與鄰近星系碰撞的結果。

sentences.english: Quality and moderation often bring more joy than an excess.
sentences.chinese: 品質和適度通常會比超額帶來更多的歡樂。

sentences.english: In fact, I usually don't catch anything.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我通常什麼都釣不上來。

sentences.english: As a Bodhisattva, he would usually be standing, and dressed in jewels.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一位菩薩，他通常是站立着，穿戴着寶石。

sentences.english: Generally, travel agencies out there with a travel agency liability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，跟旅行社出遊會有一份旅行社責任險。

sentences.english: Typically, this is used in environments that do not require substantial network bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這種特性用於不需要大量網絡帶寬的環境。

sentences.english: Tear ducts operate on a normal basis to lubricate and protect the eye.
sentences.chinese: 淚管通常可以溼潤並保護眼睛。

definition: usually/in many cases/more often than not
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
in large part/the greater part/the majority
